Workflow.Name: Admin | Welcome Email v3
Workflow.Description: This flow sends an email to a user who created an app, flow, custom connector, or environment for the first time. This flow gets triggered when a new record is created in the maker table.

Description.description: This flow sends an email to a user who created an app, flow, custom connector, or environment for the first time. This flow gets triggered when a new record is created in the maker table.
